pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Dichotomous Choice Contingent Valuation Data // Functions for analyzing dichotomous choice contingent valuation (CV) data. It provides functions for estimating parametric and nonparametric models for single-, one-and-one-half-, and double-bounded CV data. For details, see Aizaki et al. (2014) doi:10.1201/b17292.
